title: Duo Display Series: Equipped with RP2040 and ESP32 Microcontrollers
description: SB-Components has recently introduced an innovative range of compact modules on Kickstarter, featuring the RP2040 and ESP32 S3 WROOM-1 microcontrollers. These devices are equipped with a 6-DoF IMU, interchangeable displays, and versatile options for storage and connectivity. The series showcases two primary models: the Dual Roundy and the Dual Squary. The Dual Roundy boasts a […]
